question:
Which among the following statements is/are correct about the consequences of migration?
  1. Cultural conflicts relating to language and religion may be caused due to migration of a large number of people of different cultures to an area.
  2. Migrations can be a means of spreading and evolution of new cultures.
Select the correct code from the options given below:
explanation: Apart from the economic and demographic consequences, there are also the cultural, physiological and psychological consequences of migration. Cultural conflicts relating to language and religion may also be caused due to migration of a large number of people of different cultures to an area. It may also cause the problem of adjustment of the migrants in a sociocultural environment different from their own. Migrations can be a means of spreading and evolution of new cultures.
